reviews.text: Booked this hotel through American Airlines miles and when my friend and I arrived we were pleasantly surprised by how nice the hotel was, great room and awesome bathroom. The next day as we started our sightseeing I realized just how central our hotel was and we could walk to just about everything from there. The included breakfast was clutch in the mornings and the great pizza place across the street saved us when we were too lazy to do anything but crawl into our beds after walking all day. Front desk staff were extremely helpful with directions, setting up tours and flamengo shows. I would definately stay there again - the only drawback is the carpeting they put a light colored carpet in a high traffic area and it now has a worn look to it. Other than that it is an excellent hotel.
reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised

reviews.text: Stayed twice ( 5 days + 3 days) - the hotel is modern, rooms are rather small but well equiped, breakfest was very good. The staff (Josefina, Albert to name a few) wrer helpful and nice. Location is another plus, price though a bit expensive.
reviews.title: Good hotel, nice staff, good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This brand new hotel is located in the center of Buenos Aires, so it is close to the city's main atractions. The neighborhood is a bit old, ugly, and noisy, but the acoustic isolation works nice. And just a few steps from the hotel, you can reach pleasent streets. The young staff are friendly, making any kind of efforts to please you.
reviews.title: Very nice and new hotel! Fair price!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tip: don't eat on Puerto Madero: the prices are too expensive and the food just regular. You can eat better in almost any bodegon for a third of price.
reviews.title: excelent!!!!!!

reviews.text: Tip: ask for the hotel transfer for airport. When I arrived, I paid for a regular taxi AR$198 (U$50) from Ezeiza to the hotel. When I returned, using the taxi called by the hotel, I paid AR$140 (U$35).
reviews.title: Well Located and Good Price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When I arrived, the street didn't look that nice, but the entrance was nice. The reception has a modern but distinct design but the best surprise are the rooms. Modern, functional, beautiful. Was really sad that I stayed 4 nights in the Argenta tower and not here.
reviews.title: Great location, great staff
